Plot qrcode with access code

Source: R/plot_qrcode.R
plot_qrcode.Rd

Plot qrcode with access code

Usage

plot_qrcode(
  url,
  col = c("white", "black"),
  main = "title",
  code_text = "Access code",
  accesscode
)

Arguments

url

url to make into a QR code

col

colours for the qrcode

main

Plot title

code_text

Access code title

accesscode

accesscode

On this page
